author: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J:
casename: Ho Kiang Fah v Toh Buan
counsel: Appellant acting in person; Yap Teong Liang (T L Yap & Associates) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Striking out/Whether jurisdiction of High Court properly invoked where proceedings relating to subject matrimonial asset already pending in Family Court/Whether proceedings an abuse of process of court

Family Law/Family court/Ancillary powers of court/Whether Family Court more appropriate forum to litigate issues relating to division of matrimonial asset/Whether fact that ancillary proceedings pending in Family Court relevant/Whether s 112 Women's Charter (Cap 353, 1997 Rev Ed) able to apply selectively to different matrimonial assets
